subject: p18343726
History: Fever and cough. Comparison is made with prior study,. Cardiac size is top normal. New ill-defined opacity in the left lower lobe is consistent with an infectious process. The right lung is clear. There is no pneumothorax or pleural effusion. Mild degenerative changes are in the thoracic spine.
Impression: Left lower lobe pneumonia. Findings were discussed by phone with Dr. On.
